content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message from the assistant suggesting to use the 'list_files' command to get a list of files and directories in the current directory. The assistant reasoned that the 'ls -l' command in the shell can be used to list files and directories in the current directory with their permissions. The 'list_files' command was executed and returned a list of files and directories in the current directory. The output was returned to me in the form of a message from my computer.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "fix error1.log"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://helpx.adobe.com/creative-cloud/kb/troubleshoot-download-install-logs.html", "https://www.combin.com/troubleshooting/troubleshooting-the-application-returns-error-1-how-to-fix-it/", "https://helpx.adobe.com/creative-cloud/kb/configuration-error.html", "https://github.com/boltgolt/howdy/issues/408", "https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10937806/oserror-error-1-operation-not-permitted", "https://opster.com/analysis/error-1-bootstrap-checks-failed/", "https://spitfireaudio.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360005196074--Error-1-Something-went-wrong-in-Spitfire-instrument", "https://stackoverflow.com/questions/16934511/cannot-open-storyboard-com-apple-interfacebuilder-error-1"]', type='action_result')]
"""
